summary: Users are generally happy with the new UI update, finding it more intuitive. However, there is a significant cluster of complaints regarding slow loading times on mobile devices. Pricing seems to be a neutral topic.

topics.summary: Users are generally happy with the new UI update, finding it more intuitive. However, there is a significant cluster of complaints regarding slow loading times on mobile devices. Pricing seems to be a neutral topic.
Users are experiencing slow loading times on mobile devices, which is causing frustration. This issue needs to be addressed to improve user satisfaction.
Users are generally satisfied with the customer support provided, but some have reported issues with response times.
Users are generally satisfied with the pricing, but some have expressed concerns about the cost of certain features.
Users are generally satisfied with the pricing, but some have expressed concerns about the cost of certain features.
Users are generally satisfied with the project delivery, but some have expressed concerns about the timeline.

quotes.text: The new dashboard looks amazing, so much easier to use!
It takes forever to load on my iPhone since the update.
Support replied fast, but didn't really solve my issue.
